general.gigTitle: develop an autopilot, autoblog wordpress website for any niche

sellerCard.oneLiner: Customer Satisfaction Is Worth Much More Than Money !
sellerCard.description:
Hello, 
I'm Nirmal Wickramasinghe and I'm Expert in Graphic designer and Web Designer. 

I have 7 plus years of experience in Web design, graphic design, eCommerce development and other its related services.

description.content:
Hi,


Are looking for a way to make extra cash without actually doing anything regularly? My Gig will help you achieve that,


This is a special gig offer for Creating Automated websites for any niche


Features of Automated News / RSS Aggregator


  • 100% Fully Automated Posts without doing anything.
  • Ad placement is all over the website even inside the article content.
  • Ability to Spin Posted Content
  • On-page SEO (helps in ranking better in google search)



Full Package Details


  • Full website design with premium theme and plugins
  • Install the RSS feed system and optimize it
  • Adding all needed categories
  • Push Notification
  • Setup Newsletter
  • On-page SEO (helps in ranking better in google search)
  • Speed optimization
  • Log in & register the platform
  • Security & Anti-spam system
  • Add your site to Search Engines
  • Install google analytics
  • Install SSL Certificate
  • Install free CDN
  • Add all legal pages (Privacy Policy - About - Contact - Terms - Advertise)
  • Add affiliate options
  • Add your site to Google News



Demo: Contact me for Live Demo!


Requirements:


You need Domain & Hosting or WordPress dashboard logins


Please contact me before ordering!!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you send me a demo?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Sure! Please send me a message.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need before placing an order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Domain and hosting logins or WordPress dashboard logins

questionsAndAnswers.question: What platform the website built on?
Do you guarantee any earning?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No! I do not provide any earning guarantee

reviews.comment: Nirmal, is by far the BEST news website creator on Fiverr! He went above and beyond expectations.  We trust him with multiple news websites.  Thank you!
"Outstanding job! Exceeded expectations in every way. Professional, timely, and exceptional attention to detail. Highly recommend!" My experience with the website can't get any better.
Great experience. Website looks good and is functional. Great communication and delivery was on time. Highly recommended if you are looking for a wordpress autoblog. A++
